metadata.description: Koda Skills Market - A comprehensive collection of AI skills for daily productivity, travel planning, and data operations

plugins.name: travel-skills
plugins.description: Travel and transportation skills including commuting, flight booking, hotel reservations, rail travel, and itinerary planning

plugins.name: data-skills
plugins.description: Data processing skills including analysis, database operations, file handling, and visualization

plugins.name: daily-life-skills
plugins.description: Daily life assistance skills including food recommendations, weather information, news retrieval, and email management

plugins.name: productivity-skills
plugins.description: Productivity and business skills including knowledge management, memory operations, verification, foreign exchange, and specialized tools
